name: DepressPnKeR!
description:
Just a movement Game

You fall and kill until you hit the ground.  

what is your highscore?

Instructions:

you can shoot, grab, hit, collect and move.  you don't need more to sink into depression

do not hit too much, the enemies can reverse the situation

Controls:

WASD to Move

Left & Right to Target Elements

Space to Shoot, Grab and Punch
